messages.title: MAKE HISTORY ON JUNE 8TH
messages.content: You can make history by electing Scotland’s first ever Green MP

I will use my knowledge of the renewable energy industry to support the creation of over 200,000 new jobs in green energy in Scotland, allowing us to drop fossil fuels. I will work to reform our chaotic and cruel welfare system and replace it with a simple Universal Basic Income for all – that will allow people to choose whether to work, study or care.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support the creation of over 200,000 new jobs in green energy in Scotland, allowing for a transition away from fossil fuels.
Reform the welfare system and introduce a Universal Basic Income for all, providing the choice to work, study, or care.

issues.economy: Support the creation of over 200,000 new jobs in green energy in Scotland.
issues.environment: Transition away from fossil fuels to green energy.
issues.socialWelfare: Introduce Universal Basic Income for all.
